message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm asking for $9,500.  What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only willing to pay $9,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point.  Would you consider $9,200? I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to increase my offer to $9,100. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.
